trans-unit.source: Can be used with the "jQuery-FractionSlider", the "Professional jQuery Content Slider Plugin - Slider Pro" or the "Slider revolution".
data-x value: Horizontal Layer position within the Layer Grid Container [px,"left","center","right"]
data-y value: Vertical Layer position within the Layer Grid Container [px,"top","center","bottom"]
data-width value: Width of the layer [px, "none", "auto", array]
data-height value: Height of the layer [px, "none", "auto", array]
data-hoffset value: Offset horizontally from the Layer position
data-voffset value: Offset vertically from the Layer position
data-responsive_offset: Defines how offset values (hoffset,voffset) should act on responsivity.
data-basealign value: Defines if the Layer should be aligned to the Layer Grid container, or to the Slide.
